name: company_income_statement
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool real_time_finance_data.
Tool description: Get stocks / market quotes and trends, ETF, international exchanges / forex, crypto,  related news and analytics in real-time.
API description: Get public company's **quarterly** or **annual** income statement. Supports the *stock* type only.

symbol.description: The stock symbol (ticker) of the company for which to fetch the income statement. Examples: 'MSFT:NASDAQ', 'MSFT', 'AAPL'.

period.description: The period for which to retrieve the income statement. Options are 'QUARTERLY' or 'ANNUAL'.

language.description:
The language to use for the results, specified as a 2-letter language code - see [ISO 639-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes).

**Default**: *en*.
